00022 #ifndef _AbstractPacketFactory_h
00023 #define _AbstractPacketFactory_h
00024 #include "BasicVRTPacket.h"

00026 namespace vrt {
00043   class AbstractPacketFactory : public VRTObject {
00045     private: const AbstractPacketFactory *parent;
00046 
00048     public: ~AbstractPacketFactory ();
00049 
00051     public: AbstractPacketFactory (const AbstractPacketFactory *pf);
00052 
00056     public: AbstractPacketFactory ();
00057 
00065     public: inline BasicVRTPacket *getPacket (const BasicVRTPacket *p) const
00066                                            __attribute__((warn_unused_result)) {
00067       if (p == NULL) {
00068         throw VRTException("Can not determine type for NULL packet.");
00069       }
00070       PacketType type = p->getPacketType();
00071       int64_t    id   = p->getClassIdentifier();
00072       return getPacket(type, id, p);
00073     }
00074 
00082     public: inline BasicVRTPacket *getPacket (PacketType type, int64_t id)
00083                                      const __attribute__((warn_unused_result)) {
00084       return getPacket(type, id, NULL);
00085     }
00086 
00094     protected: virtual BasicVRTPacket *getPacket (PacketType type, int64_t id,
00095                                                   const BasicVRTPacket *p) const
00096                                             __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00097   };
